Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Beat the eggs in a bowl and set aside. Place the Parmesan cheese in a shallow dish.
Combine flour, salt, and baking soda in a mixing bowl, then gradually add milk until the mixture forms a soft dough. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead until it comes together.
Brush the formed dough squares with the beaten eggs, then coat the tops with Parmesan cheese. Transfer the prepared squares onto the lined baking sheet.
Bake the squares in the preheated oven until they are lightly browned, approximately 10 minutes.
